description: A Dashboard to monitor Synology NAS

targets.query: from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r._field == "uptime") |> last()

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp.SYNO") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temperature") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and r._field == "used_percent") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used" or r._field == "total") |> filter(fn: (r) => r.path == "/") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"]) |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r._field == "usage_system") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp.SYNO" and r._field == "upgradeAvailable") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

sortBy.displayName: DSM Version {_start="2025-09-04 10:12:01.65 +0000 UTC", _stop="2025-09-11 10:12:01.65 +0000 UTC", agent_host="192.168.30.69", host="telegraf", sysName="PM_RAZOR"}

targets.query: from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp.SYNO") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "modelName" or r._field == "version") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value"]) |> map(fn: (r) => ({"1_Item": if r._field == "modelName" then "Synology Model" else "DSM Version", "2_Details": r._value})) |> drop(columns: ["_field", "_value"])
from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp.SYNO" and r._field == "powerStatus") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskTable" and r._field == "diskStatus") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_time", "diskID", "_value"]) |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["diskID"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskTable" and r._field == "diskModel") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["diskID", "_value"]) |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Disk": r.diskID, "Model": r._value}))

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp.SYNO" and r._field =~ /users/) |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"]) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: if r._field == "usersSSH" then "SSH" else if r._field == "usersHTTP" then "HTTP" else if r._field == "usersSFTP" then "SFTP" else if r._field == "usersCIFS" then "CIFS" else if r._field == "usersAFP" then "AFP" else if r._field == "usersNFS" then "NFS" else if r._field == "usersFTP" then "FTP" else if r._field == "usersOTHER" then "OTHER" else if r._field == "usersTELNET" then "TELNET" else r._field })) |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskTable" and r._field == "diskTemperature") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_time", "diskID", "_value"]) |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["diskID"], valueColumn: "_value")
from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp.SYNO" and r._field == "systemFanStatus") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "raidTable" and r._field == "raidStatus") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_time", "raidName", "_value"]) |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["raidName"], valueColumn: "_value")
from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp.SYNO" and r._field == "systemStatus") |> last() |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "writes") |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ /md[2-9]/) |> group(columns: ["name"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "write_time") |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ /md[2-9]/) |> group(columns: ["name"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "write_bytes") |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ /md[2-9]/) |> group(columns: ["name"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "reads") |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ /md[2-9]/) |> group(columns: ["name"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "read_time") |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ /md[2-9]/) |> group(columns: ["name"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskio") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "read_bytes") |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name =~ /md[2-9]/) |> group(columns: ["name"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "diskTable") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "diskModel" or r._field == "diskStatus" or r._field == "diskType" or r._field == "diskTemperature") |> group(columns: ["diskID", "_field"]) |> last() |> pivot(rowKey: ["diskID"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value") |> map(fn: (r) => ({diskID: r.diskID, Model: r.diskModel, Status: r.diskStatus, "Disk Type": r.diskType, CurrentC: r.diskTemperature, MaxC: r.diskTemperature, MinC: r.diskTemperature}))

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_system" or r._field == "usage_user" or r._field == "usage_iowait") |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu == "cpu-total") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false) |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"]) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: if r._field == "usage_system" then "System" else if r._field == "usage_user" then "User" else if r._field == "usage_iowait" then "I/O" else r._field }))

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "processes") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "running" or r._field == "blocked" or r._field == "sleeping" or r._field == "stopped" or r._field == "zombies" or r._field == "paging" or r._field == "unknown" or r._field == "dead" or r._field == "idle" or r._field == "total") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "load1" or r._field == "load5" or r._field == "load15") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "usage_idle") |> filter(fn: (r) => r.cpu =~ /cpu[0-9].*/) |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 100.0 - r._value, _field: r.cpu })) |> drop(columns: ["host", "cpu"])

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent") |> drop(columns: ["host"])

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ifTable") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ifInOctets" or r._field == "ifOutOctets") |> filter(fn: (r) => r.ifDescr =~ /^eth/) |> group(columns: ["_field"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false) |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: if r._field == "ifInOctets" then "Total In" else "Total Out" }))

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "syslog") |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true) |> limit(n: 50) |> keep(columns: ["_time", "severity", "hostname", "appname", "_value"])

from(bucket: "monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "syslog") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value =~ /<14>/) |> count() |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: now(), _field: "Info", _value: r._value}))

list.label: Syno:
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp.SYNO" WITH KEY = "agent_host"

list.label: Interface:
list.name: intf
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ifTable" WITH KEY = "ifDescr" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host/

list.label: Appname
list.name: appname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=appname

list.label: LogHostname
list.name: logHost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=hostname

list.label: Severity
list.name: severity
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM syslog WITH KEY=severity

list.label: disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name"

title: Synology DashBoard
